name: YouTube Poop World
summary:
Welcome to a world unlike ours.

This world is very unusual. It builds from the remains of our own civilization and, in a very odd twist, has many of its people based on characters that have made appearences in YouTube Poops! The world is run by an empire controlled by celebrities in the YTP Community, and its cities based on the ones seen in said poops.

Although the world seems peaceful, it is quite chaotic. I.M. Meen, of all people, has damaged the world's reputation by killing off bronies and making deals with other enemies to take over this fine world! It seems that the world has become a cesspool of sin...
